mapper.select: select productImage from product where productNum=#{productNum}
select * from product order by productName
mapper.insert: insert into product (productNum, productName, price, description, productImage) values (seq_product.nextval, #{productName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{productImage})
mapper.update: update product set productName=#{productName}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, productImage=#{productImage} where productNum=#{productNum}
